item.title: 气候援助不足，非洲转向不稳定的保险形式
item.description:
非洲国家正在购买参数保险，以帮助灾后恢复。但它并不总能赔付— 而且它不能替代富裕世界的气候补偿。【原文：

African countries are buying parametric coverage to help with disaster recovery. But it doesn’t always pay out — and it’s no substitute for climate compensation from the rich world.

】

item.title: 破解屋顶太阳能是打破欧洲电网的一种方法
item.description:
急于安装数百万个智能电池板正在造成电力网络内部的漏洞。【原文：

The rush to install millions of smart panels is creating vulnerabilities inside electricity networks.

】

item.title: 特朗普被认为不太可能阻碍可持续出售债务的步伐
item.description: 华尔街的可持续发展负责人预计，即使在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）这届对环境、社会和公司治理不太友好的政府执政期间，借款人也会继续利用蓬勃发展的全球债务市场为其可持续发展目标提供资金。【原文：Sustainability chiefs on Wall Street expect borrowers to continue to tap the booming global debt market to fund their sustainability goals, even during Donald Trump’s less ESG-friendly administration.】

item.title: 随着人工智能需求激增，GE Vernova 将利用天然气为城市规模的数据中心供电
item.description: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova Inc.【原文：GE Vernova Inc. has signed multiple contracts to sell natural gas turbines for data centers that will use enough power to light up major cities, the company’s top executive said.】

item.title: 圣安娜风如何蔓延马里布野火
item.description:
南加州的干热风将植被变成了噼啪作响的火药。【原文：

Hot, dry winds in Southern California have turned vegetation into crackling tinder. 

】

item.title: 埃克森正在探索为数据中心提供低碳电源
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司正在为一家大型天然气发电厂配备碳捕集设备，努力为数据中心提供无排放电力。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is working to provide emission-free electricity to data centers by equipping a large natural gas-fired power plant with carbon-capture equipment.】

item.title: 中国计划成为气象超级大国
item.description: 今天的时事通讯将探讨特朗普重返白宫如何给了中国成为天气超级大国的机会。您还可以在 Bloomberg.com 上阅读和分享完整版报道。如需无限制地获取气候和能源新闻，请订阅。【原文：Today’s newsletter looks at how Trump’s return to the White House is giving China a chance to become a weather superpower. You can also read and share a full version of the story on Bloomberg.com. For unlimited access to climate and energy news, please subscribe.】

item.title: 马里布野火肆虐，干风助长火焰，火势失去控制
item.description: 加利福尼亚州马里布的一场野火在一天之内几乎扩大了一倍，危险的大风煽起熊熊烈火，促使电力公司切断电源，烧毁了许多房屋。【原文：A wildfire in Malibu, California, has almost doubled in size in a day, burning down homes as dangerous winds fan the flames and prompt utilities to cut power.】

item.title: 强风暴侵袭纽约市和东北部地区，威胁断电
item.description: 肆虐美国东海岸的强风暴将在周三迅速增强，在向纽约市和该地区其他地方发动暴雨和狂风时，有可能引发停电。【原文：A severe storm raking the US East Coast will intensify rapidly on Wednesday, threatening to trigger power outages as it unleashes heavy rain and winds on New York City and the rest of the region.】

item.title: 尽管行业遭遇挫折，阿曼仍坚持绿色氢能目标
item.description: 尽管其他国家生产或进口氢燃料的一些项目被推迟或取消，但阿曼仍然看到了绿色氢气的光明前景，并计划成为其主要供应国。【原文：Oman still sees a bright future for green hydrogen and plans to become a major supplier, despite a number of projects to produce or import the fuel in other countries being delayed or scrapped.】

item.title: 瑞银财富称绿色投资者对特朗普的担忧 "过于夸张
item.description: 瑞银集团全球财富管理部门表示，唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫不太可能削弱绿色投资。【原文：It’s unlikely that the return of Donald Trump to the White House will undermine the case for green investments, according to UBS Group AG’s global wealth management arm.】

item.title: 南非呼吁各方关注输电网投资
item.description: 南非表示，它已向投资者发出信息征集令，以开发国家输电网，使南非能够从煤炭过渡到清洁能源。【原文：South Africa said it’s issued a request for information for investors to develop the national transmission grid that will allow the country to transition from coal to clean-energy sources.】

item.title: 美国食品日期标签已损坏。政府正试图修复它们。
item.description:
消费者很难理解数十种不同措辞的标签，往往错误地认为它们都与食品安全有关。【原文：

Consumers struggle to understand dozens of differently worded labels, often incorrectly assuming they all refer to food safety.

】

item.title: 印度顶级绿色能源公司将收购在美国上市的股票
item.description: 印度一家领先的绿色电力公司 ReNew Energy Global Plc 的主要股东正寻求收购该公司公开持有的股份，为其从美国上市中退出铺平道路。【原文：The main shareholders of a leading Indian green power company, ReNew Energy Global Plc, are looking to acquire the publicly held shares of the company, paving the way for an exit from its US listing.】

item.title: 光伏行业陷入困境，隆基推迟在中国建设太阳能组件工厂
item.description: 隆基绿色能源技术有限公司（Longi Green Energy Technology Co.【原文：Longi Green Energy Technology Co. delayed the start of a 15-gigawatt solar module factory in eastern China by 18 months as the sector faces overcapacity and a fierce price war.】

item.title: 特朗普回归让中国有机会成为下一个气象超级大国
item.description:
在中国大力投资气候研究之际，保守的 "2025 项目 "路线图却要求削减海洋大气局的资金。【原文：

The conservative Project 2025 roadmap calls for slashing NOAA funding at a time when China is investing heavily in climate research.

】

item.title: Datamaran 宣布与德勤达成使用 ESG 软件的协议
item.description: 可持续发展相关软件供应商 Datamaran 宣布与德勤在三个欧洲市场开展合作，为企业提供更好地评估其环境和社会影响及风险的方法。【原文：Datamaran, a provider of sustainability-related software, announced a collaboration with Deloitte in three European markets to provide companies with ways to better assess their environmental and social impacts and risks.】

item.title: South32 希望特朗普允许进入阿拉斯加铜矿区
item.description: South32 Ltd. 乐观地认为，即将上任的特朗普政府将开放阿拉斯加西北部铜矿丰富地区的开采权，这家澳大利亚矿商在该地区拥有开发权。【原文：South32 Ltd. is optimistic the incoming Trump administration will open up access to a copper-rich region in northwest Alaska, where the Australian miner has development rights.】

item.title: 新西兰银行以转向电动汽车为由，限制向汽油销售点贷款
item.description: 新西兰银行已开始限制向加油站提供贷款，称随着越来越多的驾驶者转向电动汽车，这些企业的前景变得暗淡。【原文：The Bank of New Zealand has started to limit lending to gasoline outlets, saying the outlook for those businesses is becoming clouded as more drivers shift to electric vehicles.】

item.title: 不景气预示着价值 3190 亿美元的 ESG 债券市场 "消亡
item.description: 今年，与可持续发展相关的债券交易大幅下滑，这促使银行家和投资者质疑，这个规模达3190亿美元的市场能否重获青睐。【原文：Sustainability-linked bond deals have tumbled this year, prompting bankers and investors to question whether the $319 billion market will ever regain favor.】

item.title: 澳大利亚在最大规模的可再生能源招标中选择英国石油公司和 Neoen 项目
item.description: 澳大利亚在其迄今为止最大的可再生能源招标中选择了 19 个项目，作为其推动世界领先的过渡计划的一部分，以摆脱老化的燃煤电厂。【原文：Australia selected 19 projects in its biggest renewable-energy tender yet, as part of plans to stimulate a world-leading transition away from an aging fleet of coal-fired plants.】

item.title: 马里布大火为佩珀代因大学学生带来 "世界末日 "般的景象
item.description: 凌晨两点左右，学生们挤在佩珀代因大学的图书馆里，透过窗户看着附近山上被风刮起的火焰。马里布的天空泛起红光。烟雾弥漫进了教学楼。【原文：At about 2 a.m., students huddled in Pepperdine University’s library and watched through the window as wind-whipped flames blazed over a nearby hill. The Malibu sky glowed red. Smoke filtered into the building.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州在暴风雨后将成为自 1930 年以来橘子产量最少的地区
item.description: 今年秋天的一场飓风加速了该产业的持续衰退，据预测，佛罗里达州本季的橘子产量为 1200 万箱，这是自 1930 年以来的最低产量。【原文：Florida’s orange production for the current season is forecast at 12 million boxes, the lowest since 1930, after a hurricane this fall accelerated an unrelenting industry downturn.】

item.title: 电动车驾驶员调查显示车主仍忠于电池车型
item.description: 一个国际游说团体的调查显示，每十位电动汽车车主中就有九位在换车时会选择电池驱动的车型，主要原因是运营成本较低。【原文：Nine in ten electric vehicle owners will stick to a battery-powered model when they trade in their car, mainly due to lower operating costs, according to a survey by an international lobby group.】

item.title: 美国银行为厄瓜多尔掉期准备出售 10 亿美元新债券
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）正在接受订单，计划出售多达 10 亿美元的债券，用于为厄瓜多尔部分现有债券的投标融资。【原文：Bank of America Corp. is taking orders for a planned sale of as much as $1 billion of bonds that will be used to finance a tender of some of Ecuador’s existing notes.】

item.title: 花旗银行裁减 ESG 分析师职位，缩减研究团队规模
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. has cut about five analyst jobs inside a small team dedicated to producing ESG and climate reports, according to people familiar with the development.】

item.title: 融化的冻土现在成了快速变暖的北极地区的碳源
item.description:
科学家在极地地区的年度成绩单中发现，该地区广袤的苔原释放的二氧化碳多于储存的二氧化碳，这种变化令人担忧。【原文：

Scientists’ annual report card on the polar region finds that its vast tundra is releasing more CO2 than it stores, a worrying shift. 

】

item.title: 洛杉矶地区野火蔓延，学校被迫停课
item.description: 周二清晨，加利福尼亚州马里布的一场野火在一小时内面积扩大了三倍，引发了疏散令，迫使学校停课，并关闭了一段太平洋海岸公路。【原文：A wildfire in Malibu, California tripled in size over the course of an hour early Tuesday morning, spurring evacuation orders, forcing schools to shut and closing a segment of the Pacific Coast Highway.】

item.title: 电动汽车电池组价格创 2017 年以来最大降幅
item.description: 根据 BloombergNEF 的一项调查，锂离子电池组的平均价格创下了七年来的最大降幅，这很可能会加速电动汽车与汽油动力汽车之间的价格平价。【原文：The average price of lithium-ion battery packs has fallen the most in seven years, according to a BloombergNEF survey, in a development likely to accelerate price parity between electric vehicles and gasoline-powered cars.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行的博廷说气候转型问题需要解决
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）主席安娜-博廷（Ana Botin）说，"需要解决 "全球如何处理向绿色经济过渡的问题。【原文：Banco Santander SA Chairman Ana Botin says there is a “need to fix” how transition to a greener economy is being handled globally.】
